Why This Blog?

I’ve always wanted to start a blog, but something held me back. The thought of not having a fixed topic or wondering if it would be interesting enough kept me from taking that first step. As time passed, my interests evolved, and I gained more experience in different areas.

Now, after diving deep into AI, machine learning, and data science, I’ve finally decided to take the leap. This blog isn’t just about sharing knowledge - it’s about documenting this exciting journey through the ever-evolving world of artificial intelligence and helping others who might be on a similar path.
